nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 94, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 106. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 75. North wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 86 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
